enumValues.description: The producer of the Site Operations stories
enumValues.name: NetworkXDR

story.description: Define either the story ID, or the incident ID and producer arguments, to query the specific XDR story
story.name: story

enumValues.description: The producer of the Site Operations stories
enumValues.name: NetworkXDR

enumValues.description: The producer of the Site Operations stories
enumValues.name: NetworkXDR

story.description: Define either the story ID, or the incident ID and producer arguments, to query the specific XDR story
story.name: story

accountName.description: Name of the account in the Cato Management Application
accountName.name: accountName

analystEmail.description: Email address of the analyst working on the story
analystEmail.name: analystEmail

analystName.description: Name of analyst working on the story
analystName.name: analystName

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the story was created
createdAt.name: createdAt

id.description: Unique Cato ID for each story
id.name: id

incident.description: Data related to the fields and incidents that were merged to create or update the story
incident.name: incident

analystFeedback.description: Fields related to analysts research of the threat incident
analystFeedback.name: analystFeedback

criticality.description:
For Network stories - The potential impact of the issue on your network. Values are from 1 (low impact) to 10 (high impact)

For Security stories - Cato's risk analysis of the story. Values are from 1 (low risk) to 10 (high risk)
criticality.name: criticality

description.description: For Security stories, description of the threat
description.name: description

engineType.description: XDR engine involved with the incident
engineType.name: engineType

firstSignal.description: Timestamp for the first incident signal related to this story
firstSignal.name: firstSignal

id.description: Unique Cato ID for each story
id.name: id

indication.description: An indication is a set of actions and behaviors for the Network or Security incident. Each producer has different indications.
indication.name: indication

lastSignal.description: Timestamp for the last (most recent) incident signal related to this story
lastSignal.name: lastSignal

producer.description: Producer (specific XDR engine and service) involved with the incident
producer.name: producer

enumValues.description: The producer of the Site Operations stories
enumValues.name: NetworkXDR

producerName.description: Full name of the Producer (specific XDR engine and service) involved with the incident
producerName.name: producerName

queryName.description: Category for the indication ID related to the story
queryName.name: queryName

research.description: The value is TRUE when the story is currently being researched by Security Analysts
research.name: research

site.description: Cato ID and name for the site
site.name: site

definition.description: A reference identifying the Site object. ID: Unique Site Identifier, Name: The Site Name
definition.name: SiteRef

siteName.description: Site name related to the story
siteName.name: siteName

source.description:
For Network stories - The site where the network issue is occurring

For Security stories - IP address, name of device, or SDP user on your network involved in the story
source.name: source

sourceIp.description: The source IP address of the device in your network sending or receiving the flow
sourceIp.name: sourceIp

storyDuration.description: Amount of time since the story was opened (no value for closed stories)
storyDuration.name: storyDuration

ticket.description: The ticket an analyst created for this story
ticket.name: ticket

user.description: Cato ID and name for the user
user.name: user

definition.description: A reference identifying the User object. ID: Unique User Identifier, Name: The User Name
definition.name: UserRef

vendor.description: Vendor that identified the incident, such as Cato or Microsoft
vendor.name: vendor

playbook.description: URL for the playbook in the Knowledge Base to help troubleshoot the story
playbook.name: playbook

definition.description: For XDR stories, items that happened during the lifetime of the story

additionalInfo.description: Additional information about this timeline item
additionalInfo.name: additionalInfo

analystInfo.description: Data about the analyst for this timeline item (ie. name, email)
analystInfo.name: analystInfo

context.description: Brief summary of action related to the timeline item (ie. Story created, Status update to)
context.name: context

createdAt.description: Timestamp the timeline item was created
createdAt.name: createdAt

type.description: Type of threat assigned by the analyst
type.name: type

definition.name: TimelineItem

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the story was most recently updated
updatedAt.name: updatedAt
